Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: My sensory system has detected inhospitable life. Go away if you do not want to get wiped out. The bounty is mine.

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: My retina scanner validates that you are part of the Guild? I thought I was the only one on this assignment.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: That makes two of us I guess. Wanna split the bounty?

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: That would be against my protocols, I was programmed to seek and kill. I’m ful-

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Fulfilling your base functions, I know all that crappy speech.

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: Yes. I must immediately exterminate this young creature.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Wait, the creature is supposed to be 50 years old. That is not young at all.

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: Species age differently. Sadly we will never know how long this will reach. *Aims directly to the floating recipient*

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: Hostile attack detected, emergency protocol on progress. Eliminating the objective.
